description.translate: Discreet, it inexorably leads to an incisive cold.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Lancinement\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Discret, il conduit inexorablement\"}","{\"text\":\"§7vers un froid incisif.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Discreet, it inexorably leads\"}","{\"text\":\"§7to an incisive cold.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a4 §7DAR§a2 §7HER§c-2\"}"]}}
